attributes.action: Take forceful action against the Trump Immigration Ban.
attributes.additional_details: Your job is to represent the people of the UK on the international stage. I,for one do not want to see what started in 1936 in Germany repeated. Mr Trump's first week in "power" has all the earmarks of repeating what happened back then.  Please speak up now, speak up for all those people who do not have a voice.
attributes.background: Saying you do not "agree" with Mr Trump's immigration ban is not good enough. Do something.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178727
